feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Classic Desktop Icons 1.2.1
entry.content: • Add option to force non-translucent selection rectangle

entry.title: Taskbar Labels for Windows 11 1.1.5
entry.content: • Fixed an overflow regression for a centered taskbar for Windows 11 22H2 before update KB5030310 ("Moment 4" update). The bug was introduced in version 1.1.4.

entry.title: Fix PPEE Wow64 filesystem redirection 1.0
entry.content:
Fix Wow64 filesystem redirection for PPEE

When loading a file from C:\Windows\System32, PPEE would automatically be redirected to C:\Windows\SysWOW64.

This mod disables that redirection, so that the correct file is loaded.

Before:

After:

entry.title: Better Taskbar Autohide 1.1
entry.content:
• Support Windows 11
  • Fix image URL in readme

entry.title: Better Taskbar Autohide 1.0
entry.content:
Better Taskbar Autohide

Windows taskbar is forced to show at the top when there are notifications for inactive windows and auto-hide enabled, which can cover something. This module allows the taskbar to be shown for a while and then re-hidden.

entry.title: Taskbar Clock Customization 1.3.2
entry.content: • Fixed clock with seconds precision issue for some Windows 11 versions.

entry.title: Taskbar Labels for Windows 11 1.1.4
entry.content: • Initial fixes for the incompatibility with Windows 11 22H2 update KB5030310 ("Moment 4" update). There are still known bugs, but it's mostly usable.

entry.title: Taskbar minimize/restore on scroll 1.0.5
entry.content:
• Improved compatiblity with other mods such as: Cycle taskbar buttons with mouse wheel.
  • Fixed command invoking multiple times on rapid scrolling, which could cause a window to be un-maximized when restored.

entry.title: Cycle taskbar buttons with mouse wheel 1.1.2
entry.content: • Fixed the incompatibility with Windows 11 22H2 update KB5030310 ("Moment 4" update).

entry.title: Taskbar minimize/restore on scroll 1.0.4
entry.content: • Fixed the incompatibility with Windows 11 22H2 update KB5030310 ("Moment 4" update).

entry.title: Taskbar Clock Customization 1.3.1
entry.content: • Fixed the incompatibility with Windows 11 22H2 update KB5030310 ("Moment 4" update).

entry.title: Classic Desktop Icons 1.1.1
entry.content: Fix conflict with Explorer in SysListView32 mode

entry.title: Themed Regedit ListView 1.0.0
entry.content:
Themed Regedit ListView

For a brief time during Windows 10's life, the Registry Editor had a themed ListView. This mod restores that.

Before:

After:

entry.title: No Taskbar Item Glow 1.0.0
entry.content:
No Taskbar Item Glow

This mod disables the glow effect that is shown when hovering taskbar items in Windows 7, 8, and 8.1. This is primarily useful if you're going for a Windows Vista look.

Before:

After:

entry.title: Windows 11 Taskbar Styler 1.1.3
entry.content: • Fixed mod not unloading when disabled.

entry.title: Classic Desktop Icons 1.1.0
entry.content: • Fix for initial Explorer launch

entry.title: Taskbar Clock Customization 1.3
entry.content:
Taskbar Clock Customization v1.3

  • Added text alignment customization option (Windows 11).
  • Styles are applied automatically without having to hover over the clock, and are restored when the mod is disabled (Windows 11).
  • Text spacing can now be customized on Windows 11, not only on Windows 10.

entry.title: Classic Desktop Icons 1.0.0
entry.content:
Classic Desktop Icons

This mod will enable classic theme on desktop icons when themes are enabled, and will optionally let you restore the Windows 2000 behavior of rendering the desktop color on the items' labels.

For label backgrounds to show, you must DISABLE desktop icon label shadows.

Screenshots

Windows XP style (shadows, no label backgrounds):

Windows 2000 style (no shadows, label backgrounds):

Mod originally authored by Taniko Yamamoto.

entry.title: Windows 11 Taskbar Styler 1.1.2
entry.content: • Fixed a crash loop when some styles are used.

entry.title: Windows 11 Taskbar Styler 1.1.1
entry.content: • Improved parent control matching.
